data.name: Balls Mania!
data.detailed_description:
"Balls Mania!" presents a truly unique and creative fun filled game that is 100% mouse controlled! You'll need quick reflexes and lots of practice to conquer this game and establish your high score as the king of this game!

Use your mouse to maneuver your ball to catch the blue balls on the screen while avoiding contact with all of the red balls bouncing around the screen. As you progress, the action will speed up and make things much more challenging. You'll be able to snag ball goop and place it with your left mouse button in the path of fast moving enemy balls to slow them down and try and gain some control back. Capturing a sword will allow you to slice enemy balls in half by just moving your ball near them. Shields can also help protect you from death, but be careful because in this game, you only get one life!

data.short_description: How well can you control your balls when they are completely unrestrained and free as the wind? Scoring points by capturing your blue balls has never been more fun! Use your quick reflexes, ball goop, swords and more to claim your fame in this relentless action game!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7 or Higher
  • Processor: 1 Ghz CPU
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 128 MB graphics card minimum
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 100 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel i5 or equivalent
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GT 650 or AMD HD 6870 or above
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 100 MB available space
